name: Beltrante, Appellant, v. Bureau of Corrections

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Bbien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManKERINO, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts, Mr. Justice Nix and Mr. Justice Mandeeino concur solely on the ground that the statute of limitations has barred the cause of action.
parties: Beltrante, Appellant, v. Bureau of Corrections.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Oukiam,
Order of Commonwealth Court affirmed.
Mr. Justice Roberts, Mr. Justice Nix and Mr. Justice Mandeeino concur solely on the ground that the statute of limitations has barred the cause of action.
opinions.author: Pee Oukiam,

attorneys: William B. H. Broome, with him Martin Heller, for appellant.
Marc Kapustin, Deputy Attorney General, with him. Benjamin Lerner, Deputy Attorney General, and Israel Packet, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Beltrante, Appellant, v. Bureau of Corrections.
Argued November 14, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Bbien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManKERINO, JJ.
William B. H. Broome, with him Martin Heller, for appellant.
Marc Kapustin, Deputy Attorney General, with him. Benjamin Lerner, Deputy Attorney General, and Israel Packet, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 4, 1973:
